author: jbellis
msg: Change select timeout from 100ms to 1.   This mitigates a bug on some systems where the select doesn't process new data until the next call.  (Spinning faster doesn't increase load on an idle system.)  patch by jbellis; tested by goffinet

author: cutting
msg: AVRO-25.  Add blocking value writer.  Contributed by Thiruvalluvan M. G.
